verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bwana awabariki
Bwana awabariki
[Bwana] awabariki milele

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1. Ukimcha Mungu -
Bwana awabariki
Na kutembea -
pamoja naye -
Heri ni yako -

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
2. Na mke wako -
Atastawi -
Kama mzabibu -
Wenye matunda -

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
3. Watoto wako -
Watafanana -
Na machipuko -
ya mzeituni -

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
4. Ubarikiwe -
Kutoka Saioni -
Maishani mwetu -
Amani kwako -
